parameters: Gale_DefaultPNG
Character: Gale
An Emerald Dragon who is Alain's partner in Bad Status
Dragon Rider, she is given a human form in this game
because I like monster girls.
Character: Gale
Gale is an aggressive physical fighter who also can use
dragon fire and wind skills as an Emerald Dragon.
The two are less master/servant and more life-long
partners who trust and understand each other. Gale in
this story is a bit more immature though because she
is in a new form. She still likes being spoiled.
The game is called Bad Status Dragon Rider. She's the
dragon and Alain is riding her (in her chest). How is
he safe? Um... Dragon magic. Yeah!
ChainCommand 600 6 z,x

AlainFace
Character: Alain
A dragon rider with bad luck with the Mini
status effect. He takes a lot of notes on
the locals/monsters everywhere he visits.
AlainFace
He is a magic user whose skills are mostly
well-rounded with nothing too special or
lacking. His elements are mainly of
lightning and water.
AlainFace
Originally a character from Bad Status
Dragon Rider, a story on dA + giantessworld
that I wrote. He's the 'responsible
adventurer' type.
Ritia_DefaultPNG
Character: Ritia
The guild receptionist in this game. She likes to tease
and slack off, but she will do her job if the Guild
Master would get angry at her if she didn't.
Her original CGs were actually made for a different
game idea originally but that idea was scrapped so I
used her here instead.
Iora_DefaultPNG
Character: Iora
The guild shop clerk who is a professional merchant and
a feline-type beastkin. A cat girl, she does fall into
her instincts at times and play around.
She fits the 'gentle tease' type of character because
she wants to maintain professionalism as a guild
merchant. She's a different character from the Bad
Status short story cat beastkin.
Slime_DefaultPNG
Character: Slime Girl
Slime girls are cute. And a necessity for a monster
girl observation game. I put in some extra effort to
add to her CGs because I wanted to depict the slime.
I'm not good at art so it was just me adding badly
drawn droplets and such, and that still took a lot
of time...
She is made mainly for the tutorial as a water element
boss. If she appears again, it would be during the
post-game.
Fox_DefaultPNG
Character: Vio the Shinobi Fox
A ninja fox. An adventurer who is trying to get strong.
She is friendly and energetic but also very impulsive.
Despite this, she is an experienced adventurer.
She is designed as a fire elemental, status ailment
causing fighter who is based on speed so that she
can support by going first.
Yes, she is a ninja fox. No, I wasn't thinking about
Naruto when I first designed her. But when I realized,
I just rolled with it. The mask was a must.
Names aren't important here but Vio in this case is
pronounced not like 'vio'let but more like 'Dio' (from
Jojo) with a V. Why? I'm not sure. Either way, as a fun
fact, her entire investigative quest was made in 1 day.
Bryn_DefaultPNG
Character: Guild Master Bryn
The guildmaster. A half-dark elf, half-human mix. She
lived in the elf village as a child, but left due to
not mixing well with the village culture.
Despite being very straight-laced in public, she does
have stress that she would like to vent out because of
always working so hard.
She was raised by the motherly village chief along
with a few other former and current forest dwellers.
She has bad blood with the elf Eury.
Originally was designed for another game based on only
alchemy, but the idea was scrapped and the character
model was reused for this game.
Mirie_Default
Character: Mirie
The alchemic magic shop owner who likes to research
status ailments, but has better luck at discovering
and making things unrelated to it.
Character: Mirie
She enjoys the Mini status effect a lot and tries her
best to learn more about it whenever she can - often
forgetting to sleep or bathe when researching.
She also originally came from another game idea that
was scrapped like Bryn and Ritia.
Her alchemy system is planned to be expanded on and is
supposed to allow for post-game key items.

ElfChief_Default
Character: Elf Village Chief
A minor character who is the connecting point for
many other characters in this story. She is a motherly
woman who adopted and cared for many species.
She raised Bryn and took care of the faeries when they
were young. Her age is a secret, but as an elf, she
has lived for a long time.
She actually gave permission for the demon succubus to
enter and hide in the forest shrine because she
believed that there wouldn't be any problems.
She may have scenarios in the post game, but for now,
she is taking care of the demon in the shrine.
Demon_Default
Character: Est
A demon succubus whose comrades were subjugated for
their Black Rubies, she is actually a coward but also
an intellectual magic expert.
As a succubus, she is capable of draining others with
her Debilitating Kiss or altering her shape with Morph.
She also is very sensitive to mana. She is a dark
elemental magic user before all else.
She is designed as an elemental magic user and a debuff
supporter with the insanity of her Debilitating Kiss
skill.
She actually is more innocent of a succubus than one
would expect and flusters at the mention of tails. I
did not plan on her being 'tsundere', but she does have
a very tsundere expression.
Demon_Blush
Demon_Angry
Demon_Lecture
Eury_DefaultPNG
Character: Eury
An elf and ancient ruins maniac who likes golems and
learned crafting and alchemy. She has bad blood with
Bryn and is a former resident of the elf village.
Character: Eury
She is both a Light Magic and Non-Elemental Magic user
because while she usually uses light, she uses her
golems as well.
A glasses wearing elf beauty is nice, but she has a
few secrets to her that will be revealed in the next
version. Her CGs and alternate art are still in
development.
She is good friends with Sitri who lived in the elf
village under the care of the village chief in the
past.
Unfortunately, an incident occured with Sitri causing
her to become cursed and unable to return. Eury left
the village to find her and used her craftsman skills
to create rings to weaken some of Sitri's curse.
Her goal is to create the Ring of Evolution in order to
change Sitri's body to dispel the curse. She set up
a facility in the ruins she was researching by the
Crystal Caverns to do this.
Rhea_DefaultPNG
Character: Rhea
A wolf beastkin - specifically a Wind Fenrir. She is
a battle junkie meathead who works for her superior
who she always calls Boss out of respect.
Rhea is friendly with Sitri as she was the one who
picked her up after the 'incident' and likes to act
as a fatherly figure to her (much to Sitri's disgust).
A physical fighter, she has sharp senses as a wolf but
is gets tunnel vision very easily (if she gets a little
distracted, she forgets to pay attention to other more
important things).
She was designed to be a more villainous investigative
quest target to raise some tension in the game. Of the
'villainous trio' she is the muscle.
Sitri_DefaultPNG
Character: Sitri
An important character who hasn't received her full
time to shine in the game yet. She is a Lamia who
is cursed due to an incident in the past.
Raised by the village chief of the elf village along
with Bryn and the faeries, Sitri was sadly unable to
return home due to her curse causing the forest to
repel her.
While she seems like a shy and softspoken girl in
front of Rhea, who picked her up when she was dying
and Eury who is extremely close to her, she does have
a wicked side hidden to her.
She has been speaking with dragons, including the Elder
Dragon of Judgment, Ciel, for some reason...
Ciel_Default
Character: Ciel
The Elder Dragon of Judgment whose story has yet to be
told fully, she is the ruler the Realm of Dragons that
is around the country of Dragon Gate.
Ciel is actually a pretty lonely dragon who has shut
herself in her realm for a long time since her sister's
death. Only the faeries have been willing to approach
her (because they don't care about her authority).
A serious and powerful being on the level of gods, she
has been guiding Gale on her journey. For what reason?
She says that it is to make Gale strong enough to stop
Sitri's Evolution...
Fairy1_Default
Character: Eira
The elder sister of the faerie twins, she is an ice
magic faerie who is a composed tease type of character.
As a faerie, she does whatever she wants.
Faeries don't have human morals, so they follow their
own whims even if it troubles others. Eira likes to
tease others and make them feel worse. She prefers
a power gap where she can look down on others.
She has a complex about her bust size because she has
not grown there in a long time, but her younger sister
blew up there and is quickly catching up to her.
She was raised by the Village Chief. She received
permission from Ciel to enter the Realm of Dragons in
exchange for favors. She actually prefers to go to town
and is responsible with saving money to do so.
Fairy2_Default
Character: Celyn
The young sister of the faerie twins, she is an earth
magic faerie who is a chaotic girl who just does what
she desires. And that desire is to make things smaller.
Faeries don't have human morals, so Celyn doesn't think
of the consequences of her actions. She just likes to
use Faeries' Blessing to shrink adventurers and play
with them even if it breaks them.
Honestly, Celyn might be the most dangerous personality
out of all of the game's characters. If one of her
toys break, she will just go find another one to
shrink down.
Her bust size is close to her sister's which she is
proud of boasting about to fluster Eira because of
how conscious Eira is of being overtaken in something.
I love her single fang smile and her childishness. She
was the reason why I made a lot of faerie CGs.
Hello. I'm the developer of this game: jellytea819
otherwise known as Jellytea Gransera.
I hope you enjoyed Bad Status Dragon Rider ver0.70.
This patch really added a lot from the original 7 day
challenge version of the game I made last year.
This time, I spent roughly a month of vacation time to
add to this patch from the minigames to the CGs to the
story. I hope you had fun and I hope there weren't too
many problems with it.
I'm actually more of an author than a game developer,
but I wanted the story of Bad Status Dragon Rider to
be told to more people so I used this game format.
I'm not an artist so I used koikatsu a lot for this
game. If I had to give credits, I used koikatsu and
pixabay and put them all together for the CGs.
In any case, this was a solo development project. I
made this entire game up to this point on my own. If
there are any bugs you would like to report or comments
you would like to make please feel free to let me know.
https://www.deviantart.com/jellytea819
and
https://giantessworld.net/viewuser.php?uid=35374
are where you can find my stories.
https://jellytea819.gumroad.com/
and
ko-fi.com/jellytea819
are where you can support me.
You can find me on twitter @jellytea819 as well.
Please comment your thoughts on the game on any of the
posts or even feel free to DM me (I might be slow on
DMs sometimes though. I apologize.)
In any case, have you done all the quests yet? There
are currently 29 available in the game! (Well, you
can't complete the 'beastkin adventurer' quest yet
until the end of the main story unfortunately...)
